p:
Many studies exist about prompting effects of UV-C radiation over plant secondary metabolism
53, 54 . The enhanced accumulation of flavonoids and phenolics under hermetic UV-C doses has been reported earlier in vegetables, fruits and other plant species
25, 27 . However, the effect on secondary metabolites production in response to light exposure clearly depends not only on the considered species but also genetic variations among species
35, 55 .
